item.title: South Korea votes to impeach acting president Han Duck-soo
item.description: Han took over the role after President Yoon was impeached by parliament two weeks ago.

item.title: 'I can't put my life on hold' - Israel's war-weary reservists look for an end to fighting
item.description: Under the burden of military service, some reservists are refusing to return to Israel's front lines.

item.title: Five Gaza journalists killed in Israeli strike targeting armed group
item.description: A Palestinian TV channel says they were in a marked media van in the central Gaza Strip.

item.title: Manmohan Singh's decisions that shaped a billion lives
item.description: Former Indian PM Manmohan Singh, who died on Thursday, led India through both good and bad times.

item.title: Ukraine captures injured North Korean soldier, says Seoul
item.description: The soldier is thought to be the first North Korean prisoner of war captured in the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
